$AVGO 📡 Rosenblatt reiterated coverage on Broadcom with a new price target

https://quantisnow.com/i/2523468?utm_source=stocktwits

45 seconds delayed.

PRICE TARGETS 
• $COST - Telsey Advisory Group Maintains Outperform on Costco Wholesale, Raises Price Target to $615 
• $BODY – DA Davidson Maintains Buy on Beachbody, Lowers Price Target to $4.75 
• $SPLK – Needham Maintains Buy on Splunk, Lowers Price Target to $145 
• $AVGO – Keybanc Maintains Overweight on Broadcom, Raises Price Target to $720 
• $BBY – Telsey Advisory Group Maintains Outperform on Best Buy Co, Raises Price Target to $130

👉 $AVGO : Broadcom earnings and guidance were better than expected. AVGO stock rose 2.5% late. Shares dipped 1.2% to 578.60 on Thursday. Broadcom stock has been consolidating, but needs to get above its 50-day line and a short-term high for an aggressive entry of 614.74. The official buy point is 677.86.

👉 $AAPL : Apple stock climbed 2.1% to 166.56, but stopped short at its 21-day line. Investors could view AAPL stock as having a double-bottom base with a 176.75 buy point. Investors could use a trendline from the early January all-time high to find slightly early entry modestly above the 50-day line. The RS line for Apple stock is just below record levels

👉 $UNP : Union Pacific stock rose 1.15% to 256.21, closing near session lows. That's after hitting 263.59 intraday, above a 256.21 buy point most of the day. The flat base is just 8% deep. The relative strength line for UNP stock is at a record high.
$AVGO We need SPY to pump today if we wanna see any type of move up
